General.Name: AM Locales Property Socimi
General.Description: AM Locales Property SOCIMI, S.A. operates as a real estate investment company in Spain. The company invests in commercial premises for leasing purpose. It is also involved in searching and management of tenants; and eventual future divestment and rotation of the property. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

0.Name: Mr. Herminio  Garcia-Baquero Arias
0.Title: Pres of the Board of Directors & CEO
